entity.name: Sonny Perdue
entity.description: US Secretary of Agriculture Sonny Perdue

text:
@realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall Slaughterhouses told you their meat is tainted with coronavirus, didn't they?  Pissed, are you, about all the food being dumped reported about in the media because you failed to strategize food delivery across the country?

So now you want to send the meat "out there somewhere."
